column1: Seed Text
The man went to the park
Elliot watches Beatrice's car drive away
He fires another clip as the JETS SCREAM overhead
As a station wagon rolls up the street, Evan and Kayleigh duck in nearby bushes
Roger calmly aims and fires one shot cleanly through the creatures' brain
Sonny moves over to the group at the vault and speaks to them
She goes into the kitchen, leaving the door open
Abe follows the Princess down an alley
She rises and goes to a desk and takes her holstered gun off her ankle
He hits a button.
He goes to a small fridge, takes out a beer and closes it
Bloom and Penelope sit in a luxurious stone based kitchen, neither touching their coffee
All units respond, code 3 – suspect’s headed north on Stanley’s
She puts her finger to her lips, and tells him to hide
The five are running to the bunker, which sits at the top of the hill.
Roper doesn’t look back, he just goes
Logan runs. Pine trees tower above him.
They see a crowd at the center of the marker crowded around a raised platform.
MARGARET flicks open the box, struggling to get the DVD out.
Frank feels their eyes on him as he begins to take off his watch.
